subtitle: As it said a lot by Samael Aun Weor which I really agree with and realize more and more, like yourself...
it's difficult to comprehend that "the mind is the destroyer of reality"
and that enlightenment is a destructive process but as you said and which you should always trust
and follow: patience, right because this process takes a long time and if we force anything or
let's say try to force ourselves through the "exit door" it's sort of like a form of self-hypnosis
rather than a form of self illumination, so you're very right to say that yeah be patient because
it's much better, it's much healthier, and it's much more enlightening to understand this process
on all levels of the being, on all levels of the human centers, so you said right now whatever you're
going through it feels very energetic, yes but the intellect also has to be illuminated too - you've
probably seen the diagram I shared a lot in videos about the different five centers the human body
has right, and the human body also has two... so we have the intellectual center and the emotional
center... and through time with patience and carrying on the practices; the superior intellect and the
superior emotions will blossom and develop and it's through the superior emotional center
and the superior intellectual center which we will find that understanding and enlightenment about
whatever we're going through and we'll just "Know" it very quickly and naturally and it won't
it won't be from a place of fear so of course any time there is fear it is it is a part of our
ego that is holding us back saying oh you know "hold on buddy, you're not quite ready to
walk through the exit door", it's just more like "hey, sit down and just reflect on the exit door, because
you can't bring this baggage with you"... so again continued meditation and
and illumination on those unconscious parts that are that are keeping us from
ascending right and as I've said a lot in order to ascend it's better to descend - to voluntarily
descend... you know there's there's a lecture, a third chamber lecture what Samael gave
which is something good to reflect on... it's that when someone is doing very good on the path,
usually in reality they're doing very bad and when someone is doing very bad on the path,
in reality they're doing very good... so there's this very subtle thing to reflect on
and I've observed it in myself a lot too that when I think I'm doing good, when I think
I'm near the door, the exit door, and I feel there's a lot of Illumination, in reality I'm
I'm not doing that good because I'm turning my back on the darkness... which I shouldn't be...
because really the work is about cleaning up the darkness, but as soon as we start
saying "okay I'm finished, let's go to the exit door" then we got a bit lazy in a way right
maybe some impatience is coming...
the superior intellect is connected... (and it's just something for you to reflect on)... the
superior intellect is connected to your... (as we talk about your particular Divine Mother)...
the superior intellect is connected to your particular individual Divine Father
it' your wisdom that will blossom down into the crown and it's as you said:
kind of the negative polarity of that is 'distrust with the Father, distrust with God;
lack of faith in your path, and lack of faith in your own intuition and your own direct knowledge'...
so over time it becomes sort of like a traditional connection with your own Inner God
because it's something you begin to worship because it's something that you know and
feel intuitively it's something that you can really begin to connect with because it
comes from beyond your mind; as you said you have a lot ofâ€”maybe there's a lot of "things that come" but
you don't know if it's ego right and so it's this gradual dissolving of all those ego elements and
when you start to begin to have those moments of Truth and intuition of "Knowing", you
recognize that it's not part of yourself and this is why there's this sort of religious worshiping
aspect of God because it's a power that is it's from your Being, it's not from you,
and so that's a relationship of trust that comes over time and
it's really connected to this "Voice of Silence", or "Voice of God" that
begins to be a gradually stronger connection in your life to guide you and help you
...and this is where the Superior Emotion comes into it and similar to the original kind of "mudra"
we could say, which is, in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and the Son is in the heart meaning
we have to feel like, in spiritual awakening, and you see this reflected in any spiritual
Master, that they feel like a child towards our own Divinity which they receive from above
and it's in the heart and the Emotional and the Superior Emotional Center that knows
what is right and what is wrong very quickly... this takes time to develop but in general
when the the old mind structures of ego of our own condition and come up in the mind through
the Superior Emotional Center it's very quick to recognize that it's just
ego, and it's really through a more inner silence that we develop a stronger intuition
and it comes less with intellectual conceptualizations and more about
following a harmonious way of being... and the thing is it's very it's usually very simple but the mind
wants it to be something very profound and some great concept but usually it's very simple to
follow and usually we have this simple wisdom that that guides us but our mind comes in and tries to
distort it, it adulterates that Divine Simplicity so this is why transmutation is also
just very helpful and required for it so that we don't
think overthink those those "Gems [moments] of Consciousness" that we develop [and experience]
